UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of Trp-containing analogs of the antimicrobial peptide gomesin.
Literature.Author: Domingues TM, Buri MV, Daffre S, Campana PT, Riske KA, Miranda A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli SBS 363(MIC=0.64µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=0.32µM),Candida albicans MDM8(MIC=0.64µM)
